nodes.text: Droids Everywhere! is a children's storybook published by Scholastic in September 2000 as part of the Star Wars Junior book series.
There are many kinds of droids living and working in the galaxy. Watto the junk dealer knows practically everything there is to know about them.
Watto will teach you anything you want to know about droids. Just be careful not to bump into things in his shop!
